items.description: Component for creating flex layouts.

items.description: Component for creating grid layouts.

items.title: Container
items.description: Constrains the maximum width of page content.

items.title: Section
items.description: Denotes a section of page content.

items.title: Text
items.description: Foundational text primitive.

items.title: Heading
items.description: Semantic heading element.

items.title: Blockquote
items.description: Block-level quotation from another source.

items.title: Code
items.description: Marks text to signify a short fragment of computer code.

items.title: Em
items.description: Marks text to stress emphasis.

items.title: Kbd
items.description: Represents keyboard input or a hotkey.

items.title: Link
items.description: Semantic element for navigation between pages.

items.title: Quote
items.description: Short inline quotation.

items.title: Strong
items.description: Marks text to signify strong importance.

items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: Modal confirmation dialog that interrupts the user and expects a response.

items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

items.title: Avatar
items.description: Profile picture, user initials or fallback icon.

items.title: Badge
items.description: Stylized badge element.

items.title: Button
items.description: Trigger an action or event, such as submitting a form or displaying a dialog.

items.title: Callout
items.description: Short message to attract user’s attention.

items.title: Card
items.description: Container that groups related content and actions.

items.title: Checkbox
items.description: Base input element to toggle an option on and off.

items.title: Checkbox Group
items.description: Set of interactive buttons where multiple options can be selected at a time.

items.title: Checkbox Cards
items.description: Set of interactive cards where multiple options can be selected at a time.

items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Menu representing a set of actions, displayed at the point of right click or long press.

items.title: Data List
items.description: Displays metadata as a list of key-value pairs.

items.title: Dialog
items.description: Modal dialog window displayed above the page.

items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Menu representing a set of actions, triggered by a button.

items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.title: Icon Button
items.description: Button designed specifically for usage with a single icon.

items.title: Inset
items.description: Applies a negative margin to allow content to bleed into the surrounding container.

items.title: Popover
items.description: Floating element for displaying rich content, triggered by a button.

items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays a progress bar related to a task.

items.title: Radio
items.description: Standalone radio button that can be used in any layout.

items.title: Radio Group
items.description: Set of interactive radio buttons where only one can be selected at a time.

items.title: Radio Cards
items.description: Set of interactive cards where only one can be selected at a time.

items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Custom-styled scrollable area using native functionality.

items.title: Segmented Control
items.description: Toggle buttons for switching between different values or views.

items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content.

items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Replaces content with same shape placeholder that indicates a loading state.

items.title: Slider
items.description: Provides user selection from a range of values.

items.title: Spinner
items.description: Displays an animated loading indicator.

items.title: Switch
items.description: Toggle switch alternative to the checkbox.

items.title: Table
items.description: Semantic table element for presenting data.

items.title: Tabs
items.description: Set of content sections to be displayed one at a time.

items.title: Tab Nav
items.description: Navigation menu with links styled as tabs.

items.title: Text Area
items.description: Captures multi-line user input.

items.title: Text Field
items.description: Captures user input with an optional slot for buttons and icons.

items.title: Tooltip
items.description: Floating element that provides a control with contextual information via pointer or focus.

items.title: Accessible Icon
items.description: Makes icons accessible by adding a label.

items.title: Portal
items.description: Renders a React subtree in a different part of the DOM.

items.title: Reset
items.description: Removes default browser styles from any component.

items.title: Slot
items.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.

items.title: Theme
items.description: Wraps all or part of a React tree to provide theme configuration.

items.title: Visually Hidden
items.description: Hides content from the screen in an accessible way.
